summary: Provides version‑aware utilities and data models for defining, validating, and persisting Fractal table specifications (such as feature tables and read‑only ROI masks) into Zarr stores, handling schema evolution and legacy compatibility.
business_intent: Standardize the storage and management of analytical tabular data within the Fractal platform, ensuring reliable serialization, validation, and backward‑compatible handling of different table versions for downstream analytics workflows.
